titleSection.name: VersionOne Java/Scala Http Client
titleSection.shortDescription: An HTTP client supporting OAuth2 and VersionOne's REST XML and Query/JSON data formats

descriptionSection.description: The VersionOne HTTP client is an OAuth2-capable client based on Apache Oltu, and specialized with methods for packing and unpacking the VersionOne endpoint XML and JSON formats.

linksSection.title: GitHub Project for Source Code and Issues

updates.releaseNotes: Initial release of VersionOne HttpClient library.

seed.shortDescription: The initial idea of a product. May not be stable code.

sapling.shortDescription: The product is undergoing rapid growth. The code works but expect major changes.

mature.shortDescription: The product is stable. The code will continue to evolve with minimum breaking changes.
